segments.text: Do you know that scientists replicated a sheep into an identical clone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard about that . It was successful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a big jump in science . Maybe more like a leap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I should say , it stunned me . I can't imagine what they will think of next .
segments.speaker: S2
